nodes.text: The Skandits' home was a forest clearing on Endor where a large band of Skandits lived. They brought prisoners there, keeping them in cells dug out from the roots of trees and secured with wooden doors. In 3 ABY, the Skandits captured several Ewoks and brought them to their home. They later received the Travelling Jindas, led by Bondo, and agreed to let the itinerant entertainers perform for them. During the performance, the Ewoks escaped their imprisonment and the fled with the Jindas into the forest.
